item.title: ADM
item.description: score:-70 Chances: Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. is engaged in the production of various agricultural commodities including oilseeds, corn, wheat, and cocoa, serving multiple end markets. Risks: The company reported lower quarterly sales and a significant drop in earnings compared to the previous year, as well as a disclosure of an ongoing internal probe by the Department of Justice and SEC related to its accounting practices.
